name: 6 oz. Hip Flask
description:
Standard issue 6 oz. hip flask. 1/4th the price of similar products at Urban Outfitters.

-    Individually Leak Tested for Quality Assurance!
-    High Quality Stainless Steel Flask and Mouth Piece
-    Attached Screw Down Cap
-    Measures 4-1/2" X 3-5/8" (approximately)
-    Brushed Stainless Steel
-    Limited Lifetime Warranty

All for only $5!

- Measures 5-3/4" x 3-5/8" (approximately)

All for only $7!

name: 12 oz. Hip Flask
description:
Jumbo-sized 12 oz. hip flask. Serves 2-4, depending on your tolerance.

- Individually Leak Tested for Quality Assurance!
- High Quality Stainless Steel Flask and Mouth Piece
- Attached Screw Down Cap
- Measures 4-1/16” x 6-1/4” x 1” 
- Brushed Stainless Steel
- Limited Lifetime Warranty

All for only $9!
